items.sentence: The flight will be delayed because of a sandstorm.

Snakes don't usually bite if they're not provoked.

Tom tried to talk Mary into going hiking with him.
Tom wasn't the first one to encourage me to do so.

I was on the verge of killing myself at that time.

My hands are tied. I can't do anything about that.
